recipesJson.name: CRM CGR
recipesJson.author: thefogvlog
recipesJson.description:
I've been chasing a creamy smooth cigar like sweet tobacco. 

This is all that, its a cigar like tobacco (Kentucky + Red Burley)  - backed up with a THICC and dirty cream (RY4 Double + CAP Sweet Cream). With a good Vanilla to hold the two together (Holy Vanilla).

Sweeten to taste - I like it at 0.2% SS.

reviews.text: Excellent tobacco recipe.  Love the taste of Burley in the morning! Sweet cream took a few days but came in nicely and rounded things out.  Great job  .. update  .  Man this is a great testing recipe using it in my v frenzy pod and loving it.
